entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening then light snow. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
